description: Snapshots of Vermont’s progress in repairing roads and bridges damaged by Hurricane Irene.
title: Vermont’s Speedy Recovery
title_page: Vermont’s Speedy Recovery From Hurricane Irene - Graphic - NYTimes.com
text:
Vermont’s Speedy Recovery
Vermont state officials managed to repair much of the 500 miles of state roads and 200 bridges that were damaged by Hurricane Irene within two and a half months of the storm. Here are snapshots in time showing the work in progress.
